hiltondesc: Welcome to Hilton Hotel, where luxury meets comfort. Enjoy spacious rooms with stunning city views, gourmet dining at our on-site restaurant, 24-hour room service, a fully equipped fitness center, and a heated indoor swimming pool. Experience exceptional hospitality and top-tier amenities for an unforgettable stay. Book your visit today.
embassydesc: Welcome to Embassy Suites, where luxury and comfort blend seamlessly. Enjoy spacious suites with city views, complimentary breakfast, an evening reception with drinks and snacks, a relaxing atrium lounge, a fully equipped fitness center, and a heated indoor pool. Experience exceptional hospitality and top-tier amenities. Book your stay today for an unforgettable visit.
hyattdesc: Welcome to Hyatt, your sanctuary in the city. Enjoy modern rooms with plush bedding, free Wi-Fi, and floor-to-ceiling windows. Delight in our rooftop bar with panoramic views, indulge in gourmet dining, unwind in the spa, and stay active in our 24-hour fitness center. Experience unparalleled comfort and style. Book your stay today.
hyattpack: Available for Peru Discovery and Vienna Getaway
marriottdesc: Welcome to Marriott, where elegance meets convenience. Our refined rooms offer plush bedding, high-speed internet, and scenic views. Enjoy our on-site gourmet restaurant, unwind in the luxurious spa, take a dip in the outdoor pool, and stay fit in our state-of-the-art gym. Experience exceptional service and amenities. Book your stay today.
marriottpack: Available for Cape Town Adventure only
renadesc: Welcome to Renaissance Hotels, where sophistication and discovery meet. Enjoy stylish rooms with luxurious bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi, and unique local art. Savor exquisite cuisine at our signature restaurant, relax in our chic rooftop lounge, rejuvenate in the spa, and stay active in our modern fitness center. Experience the extraordinary. Book your stay today.
renapack: Available for Beijing Experience and Peru Discovery
saksakdesc: Discover the charm of SakSak Rentals, where modern comfort meets rustic charm. Nestled in a serene locale, our cozy vacation homes offer spacious interiors, stylish decor, and stunning views. Enjoy easy access to local attractions and unwind in a peaceful, homey environment perfect for relaxation and adventure alike.
mimidesc: Experience ultimate comfort at Mimi Vacation Homes, where elegance and coziness blend seamlessly. Our beautifully appointed homes feature stylish furnishings, well-equipped kitchens, and inviting outdoor spaces. Located near top attractions, Mimi Vacation Homes provides a perfect retreat for both relaxation and exploration.
mimipack: Available for Turkey Escapade and Cape Town Adventure
airdesc: Embrace contemporary living at Air CnD, where sleek design meets functionality. Our modern vacation homes boast open-concept layouts, chic decor, and convenient amenities. Situated in a vibrant neighborhood, Air CnD offers easy access to dining, shopping, and entertainment, ensuring a memorable stay for all guests.
mistdesc: Step into tranquility at Mistiks, where nature and luxury converge. Our stylish vacation homes feature serene landscapes, elegant interiors, and top-notch amenities. Perfectly situated for nature enthusiasts, Mistiks offers a peaceful escape with easy access to hiking trails, local attractions, and stunning views.
cozydesc: Find your home away from home at Cozy Co, where comfort and charm await. Our inviting vacation homes offer warm, stylish decor, modern amenities, and a welcoming atmosphere. Conveniently located near local attractions, Cozy Co is the ideal spot for a relaxing and enjoyable getaway.
cozypack: Available for Vienna Getaway, Turkey Escapade, and Beijing Expereince
golddesc: Experience the height of bakery elegance at Golden Crust Bakery. Our selection of artisanal breads, pastries, and confections is crafted with the finest ingredients, offering a sophisticated taste of luxury in every bite.
goldpack: Locations in Turkey, Beijing, and Peru
refdesc: Indulge in the exquisite flavors of Refined Delights, where every pastry is a work of art. Our gourmet treats and artisanal breads are made with precision and care, providing a luxurious experience for the discerning palate.
ovendesc: Discover the sublime at The Artisan Oven, where traditional baking meets modern sophistication. Our selection of handcrafted pastries, cakes, and breads are created with premium ingredients, ensuring an exceptional and refined culinary experience.
crumbdesc: Savor the opulence of Elegant Crumbs, a bakery dedicated to the art of fine baking. Enjoy our selection of meticulously crafted pastries and decadent confections, all presented in a charming and upscale setting.
cravedesc: Elevate your dessert experience at Culinary Crave Bakery. Our gourmet pastries and artisanal breads are crafted with the utmost care, combining sophisticated flavors and elegant presentation for a truly indulgent treat.
velvetdesc: Unwind in luxury at The Velvet Lounge, where classic cocktails and artisanal spirits are served in an opulent setting. Our sophisticated ambiance and expertly crafted drinks offer an elegant retreat for discerning patrons.
loungedesc: Experience refinement at Sapphire Bar & Lounge, where premium liquors and masterfully crafted cocktails are the stars. Enjoy our chic atmosphere, plush seating, and exceptional service in a venue designed for both relaxation and celebration.
retreatdesc: Indulge in upscale relaxation at The Aristocrat’s Retreat. Our refined bar offers an impressive selection of fine wines, rare spirits, and bespoke cocktails, all served in a stylish and sophisticated environment.
retreatpack: Locations in Cape Town and Turkey
spiritsdesc: Savor the elegance of Eclipse Bar & Spirits, where expertly mixed cocktails and premium spirits take center stage. Our sleek, modern ambiance and attentive service create the perfect backdrop for an upscale night out.
opaldesc: Discover an oasis of luxury at The Opal Lounge. Our distinguished selection of fine wines, craft cocktails, and artisanal spirits is served in a chic, intimate setting, providing a refined experience for those seeking elegance and relaxation.
morndesc: Step into Morning Reverie Café, where each cup of coffee is a moment of pure bliss. Our sophisticated space and delightful pastries provide a tranquil setting for a refined coffee experience.
willowdesc: Discover the charm of Whispering Willow Café, where artisanal coffees and gourmet treats are served in a serene, nature-inspired setting. Enjoy a relaxing ambiance and exceptional flavors in every sip and bite.
roostdesc: Indulge in luxury at Velvet Roost Café, where the art of coffee meets elegant comfort. Our curated selection of brews and pastries is crafted for a truly refined café experience in a plush, inviting environment.
lumidesc: Delight in the refined atmosphere of Luminous Cup Café, where every coffee is brewed to perfection. Our elegant surroundings and selection of gourmet pastries create a chic and relaxing setting for a luxurious coffee break.
lumipack: Location in Cape Town and Vienna
horidesc: Discover a fresh perspective at Horizon Café, where expertly brewed coffee and delectable pastries meet in a contemporary, stylish setting. Enjoy a bright and inviting atmosphere perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends.
ecodesc: EcoMart is your go-to for organic and eco-friendly groceries. With a wide range of sustainable products, fresh produce, and natural goods, EcoMart helps you shop responsibly without compromising on quality.
grocerdesc: CityGrocer offers a comprehensive selection of fresh produce, pantry staples, and gourmet items. Conveniently located and stocked with everything you need for a well-rounded shopping experience.
grocerpack: Locations only in Vienna and Turkey
freshdesc: FreshPick Grocery combines quality and convenience with a variety of fresh fruits, vegetables, and everyday essentials. Enjoy a clean, well-organized store with friendly service and great deals.
freshpack: Located in Beijing, Peru and Cape Town
marketdesc: MarketPlace is a neighborhood favorite for quality groceries and local products. From everyday items to specialty finds, you’ll find great value and variety in a welcoming atmosphere.
urbandesc: UrbanBite brings the best of fresh produce, local goods, and pantry essentials to your doorstep. Experience personalized service and a wide selection of high-quality items for all your grocery needs.
loridesc: Nestled in a serene neighborhood, Lori's Home offers cozy comfort with a touch of elegance. Enjoy a beautifully furnished space, modern amenities, and a lovely garden. Perfect for relaxation and convenience, it’s an ideal retreat for a peaceful getaway. Experience warmth and hospitality at its best.
burtdesc: Discover charm and relaxation at Burt's Home, a cozy retreat featuring rustic decor and modern comforts. Located in a friendly neighborhood, it boasts spacious rooms, a well-equipped kitchen, and a charming backyard. Ideal for families and friends seeking a tranquil, homey escape.
clairedesc: Claire's Home blends modern luxury with cozy comfort. Enjoy stylish, well-appointed rooms, a gourmet kitchen, and a lovely garden. Located in a vibrant area, it offers easy access to local attractions and dining. Perfect for those seeking a stylish yet welcoming retreat.
suzydesc: Suzy's Home offers a delightful mix of charm and modern convenience. With its inviting decor, spacious living areas, and a well-maintained garden, it’s the perfect spot for a relaxing stay. Enjoy a comfortable, home-like atmosphere in a welcoming neighborhood, close to local attractions.
suzypack: Available for Cape Town Adventure only
bobdesc: Experience cozy elegance at Bobaloo's Home. This charming retreat features inviting decor, comfortable furnishings, and a serene backyard. Located in a quiet area, it provides a peaceful haven with easy access to nearby attractions. Perfect for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.
cheapydesc: Affordable and cozy, Cheapy Hostels offer a welcoming environment for budget travelers. With comfortable dorms, friendly staff, and essential amenities, you’ll find everything you need for a pleasant stay without breaking the bank. Enjoy a sociable atmosphere and prime locations close to local attractions and transport.
emberdesc: Experience warmth and comfort at Ember Hostel. Stylishly designed with a cozy atmosphere, Ember provides modern dorms, private rooms, and vibrant communal spaces. Enjoy thoughtful amenities, friendly staff, and a convenient location that puts you close to the city's best spots for exploration and relaxation.
selinadesc: Selina Hostel blends modern comfort with a vibrant social scene. Enjoy chic, well-equipped rooms and lively communal areas perfect for meeting fellow travelers. With a focus on both relaxation and adventure, Selina offers stylish accommodations, unique experiences, and a prime location to explore the city’s culture and nightlife.
selinapack: Available for Turkey Escaade, Peru Dsivocery, and Cape Town Adventure
harvestdesc: Discover farm-fresh produce, artisanal goods, and local delicacies at Fresh Harvest Market. Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere where quality and community come together, offering everything from organic vegetables to handmade crafts.
centraldesc: Explore a bustling hub of diverse vendors at City Central Market. From gourmet treats to unique crafts, this market delivers a rich variety of goods in a lively, urban setting.
greendesc: Greenfield Market offers a delightful mix of organic produce, local meats, and homemade specialties. Immerse yourself in a welcoming environment where you can find the best of local farming and artisan food.
sunsetdesc: Sunset Plaza Market is your go-to destination for fresh, locally-sourced products and unique handmade items. Enjoy a vibrant community atmosphere and discover something special at every visit.
luxedesc: Luxe Haven offers a sophisticated shopping experience with upscale boutiques, gourmet dining, and chic entertainment. Discover luxury and style in a beautifully designed setting.
metrodesc: Metro Heights is your destination for fashion-forward shopping, diverse dining, and lively entertainment. Enjoy a modern atmosphere with a range of high-quality stores and activities.
metropack: Only for available Cape Town Adventure
eclipsedesc: Eclipse Plaza combines contemporary shopping with exquisite dining and vibrant entertainment options. Explore top brands and unique finds in a dynamic, sleek environment.
spectrumdesc: The Spectrum features a colorful array of shops, restaurants, and attractions. Experience a lively and inclusive space where you can shop, dine, and unwind.
harmonydesc: Harmony Center blends elegant retail options with delightful dining and engaging entertainment. Enjoy a serene shopping experience in a well-rounded, welcoming atmosphere.
beijingdesc: Immerse yourself in the rich culture of Beijing with unique souvenirs. From traditional silk scarves to handcrafted jade, Beijing Treasures offers a diverse selection of authentic keepsakes that celebrate the city's heritage.
capedesc: Immerse yourself in the spirit of Cape Town with a curated selection of local crafts and unique gifts. From iconic Table Mountain mementos to vibrant arts and crafts, Cape Town Keepsakes has the perfect token for every visitor.
viennadesc: Bring home a piece of Vienna with unique souvenirs like handcrafted Mozart figurines, iconic Sachertorte chocolate, and vintage Vienna postcards, all celebrating the city's timeless elegance.
turkdesc: Experience the sweet side of Turkey at Turkish Delight Emporium. From delectable lokum (Turkish delight) to beautifully crafted ceramics and textiles, this store offers a delightful taste of Turkish culture.
perudesc: Bring home the essence of Peru with our handcrafted souvenirs. Choose from colorful alpaca wool scarves, intricate Andean jewelry, and charming local art pieces that celebrate Peru’s rich traditions.
elysiandesc: Indulge in unparalleled luxury at Elysian Table, where each dish is a masterpiece crafted from the finest ingredients. Our sophisticated ambiance, paired with a meticulously curated menu, offers a dining experience that celebrates elegance and culinary artistry.
elysianpack: Locations in Vienna, Turkey and Cape Town
opulentdesc: Discover culinary excellence at Opulent Harvest, where seasonally inspired dishes are prepared with artistry and precision. Enjoy a refined atmosphere and impeccable service, making each dining experience an exquisite journey through the world of haute cuisine.
bistrodesc: Experience the epitome of gourmet dining at Luxe Bistro, where contemporary elegance meets classic sophistication. Our inventive menu features the finest ingredients, meticulously prepared to delight your palate in an intimate, stylish setting.
celestialdesc: Immerse yourself in a world of culinary brilliance at Celestial Cuisine. Our renowned chefs craft each dish with passion and precision, creating a harmonious blend of flavors that are enhanced by our luxurious, refined dining environment.
granddesc: Savor an unforgettable dining experience at Grand Harvest, where every meal is a celebration of gourmet excellence. From elegantly presented dishes to a graceful, opulent setting, we offer a feast for both the senses and the soul.
